text: i feel tired all the time and nothing motivates me
sleep is not helping and i cry for no reason
my mind races and i cant focus on simple tasks
sometimes i feel numb and i dont care about things
i get panic attacks when i think about going out
im ok most days but occasionally feel very down
i feel anxious about small conversations and social situations
i had a good day today, enjoyed a walk with a friend
i worry a lot about my future and it keeps me up at night
i made coffee and read a book, felt calm and relaxed
nothing seems enjoyable anymore and i withdraw from friends
my heart races and i feel short of breath without reason
i completed a small task today and felt proud
i feel worthless and guilty even when others are kind
i cant stop worrying about mistakes i made in the past
watched a funny show today and laughed a lot
i have trouble sleeping and my appetite changed
i panic when my phone rings and avoid answering calls
i met a friend and the conversation lifted my mood
i feel overwhelmed by small things and cry often
